### Code Coverage

### Reviews

| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [ismaelsadeeq](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30272#pullrequestreview-2116107521) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#30239](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30239) (Ephemeral Anchors, take 2 by instagibbs)
* [#30079](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30079) (Fee Estimation: Ignore all transactions that are CPFP'd by ismaelsadeeq)
* [#30058](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30058) (Encapsulate warnings in generalized node::Warnings and remove globals by stickies-v)
* [#28984](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28984) (Cluster size 2 package rbf by instagibbs)
* [#28710](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28710) (Remove the legacy wallet and BDB dependency by achow101)
* [#28676](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28676) ([WIP] Cluster mempool implementation by sdaftuar)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
